Nerangs.ab: (Pahl.) az gyāg āb andar sar barsom kunišn (Per.) āb-e sakāle bardāštan goftan frastuiiē humatōibiiasca āb bar sakāle riḫtan hīxtōibiiasca āb bar māhruy riḫtan huuarəštōibiiasca āb bar hāvan riḫtan mąϑβōibiiasca āb zamin riḫtan sakāle nikāne inǧā nahādan tā sar ḫāndan (Y12.3-4) tanāvasčid xᵛax́iiā uštanəm stōmī dast va hāvan kardan dast be māruy nahādan aṣ̌əm (Y12.5) ašem vāhi yek ḫāndan (Y12.6) nāsmī daēuuō goftan tanggol zadan ke div farib dādan.

"(Pahl.)He has to put the ab on the top of the barsom . (Pers.) He should take the cup for the āb. At frastuiiē humatōibiiasca he should pour water into the cup. At hīxtōibiiasca, he should pour water on the māhruy. At huuarəštōibiiasca, he should pour water on the hāwan. At mąϑβōibiiasca, he should pour water on the floor and then put there the cup. He should then recite until the end, i.e. (Y12.3) tanāvasčid xᵛax́iiā uštanəm. At (Y12.4) stōmi he should put the hand on the hāwan and then he has to touch the hand to the māhruy and recite one (Y12.5) Aṣ̌əm Vohū. He should then recite (Y12.6) nāsmī daēuuō and ululate so that he plays away the div."
